summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4318 for the improvement of the alley in Block 3, College Addition, and the north and south alley in Block 4, University Place Addition, being the alley between 20th Avenue Northeast and 21st Avenue Northeast, extending from East 61st Street to East 63rd Street; by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 51220, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
